item.title: 【基础SROP】【sig_return】ciscn_s_3
item.description: 原题链接 checksec查看程序架构 ida查看程序伪代码 构建exp 完整exp checksec查看程序架构 $ checksec --file ciscn_s_3 [*] '/home/peterl/security/workspace/ciscn_s_3/ciscn_s_3' Arch: amd64-64-little RELRO: Partial RELRO Stack: No canary found NX: NX enabled PIE: No PIE (0x400000) i
